titleStmt.title: Articles to be enquired of by the church-wardens in the visitation of the Right Worshipfull, Master Robert Iohnson, batchelor in diuinitie, and Arch-deacon of Leicester, in the yeare of our Lord God. 1622..
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Leicester. Archdeacon (1591-1625 : Johnson)
Johnson, Robert, 1540-1625.
